content: this is the crochet pattern needed to make a simple straightforward pair of crochet socks we use the single_crochet stitch and strategic increasing to create a sleek foot and heel for this sock pattern you will need a fingering weight yarn and a 4mm size crochet hook materials fingering/size 1 yarn 1 stroll fingering in sprinkle heather pictured -approx 210 240 310 360 420 yards total crochet hook in size 4mm 2 or size needed to obtain gauge crochet hook in size 3 5mm 3 for edging 2 stitch markers there are five sizes included and a video tutorial 1 https //www awin1 com/cread php awinmid=89047&awinaffid=1976179&ued=https%3a%2f%2fwww crochet com%2fyarn%2fstroll%2fc%2f5420133 2 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=2246760&u=780171&m=59159&urllink=&afftrack= 3 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=2246760&u=780171&m=59159&urllink=&afftrack=
